overview: When a group of hunky buddies gets together to rent a beach house on the Cali coast for the summer, their season of surf, sex and sand quickly turns into a summer of bliss. What starts out as searching for the biggest wave aggressively turns into a search for the biggest cock, and these studs will never be done 'Looking for the Big One'.
tagline: Summer and surf are always fun, but studs on the beach and big hard dicks will always be number one in 'Looking for the Big One'.
title: Looking For The Big One
